Characteristics

Eris Seifort (エリス・セイファート, Erisu Seifāto?) is the bearer of the Mortal Sin Skill "Lust" and the Queen of the Royal Capital Seifort.



Advertisement
Appearance
Eris is beautiful girl with lilac eyes and long shoulder length blue hair. When she first met Fate at the tavern, she appeared in casual clothes.[1] Later she often dresses in her Queen costumes.

Personality
Background
Abilities
Lust (色欲, Shikiyoku?) - a Skill of Mortal Sin which allows the bearer to charm anyone be they male or female, young or old, or even drawing monsters' attention on large scale.

Eris has achieved the Domain of E, so naturally she possess all fundamental stats of such area.

The ability of using the Black Gunblade of Envy.

The ability of using the "arcane eyes" implanted in herself. So far, four types have been introduced:

Night Vision: Not the skill "Night Vision", but a type of arcane eyes that share the same benefit of the skill.[2]
Positioning Eyes: Grant the ability to locate enemy's spot, even they are invisible.[3]
Immobilizing Eyes: Grant the ability to freeze the enemy in the user's sight.[4]
Future Eyes: Grant the ability to glance a few seconds to the future.[5]
